solution_line_template: First find the total number of fronds on all the ferns: {fronds_per_fern} fronds/fern * {num_ferns} ferns = <<{fronds_per_fern}*{num_ferns}={total_fronds}>>{total_fronds} fronds
Then find the total number of leaves on {total_fronds} fronds: {total_fronds} fronds * {leaves_per_frond} leaves/frond = <<{total_fronds}*{leaves_per_frond}={total_leaves}>>{total_leaves} leaves
